text:
Intergalactic Agency (https://intergalactic.com/) | Full Stack Developer | Vancouver, BC, Canada | Full-time | Onsite

Intergalactic is looking for an Intermediate to Senior Full Stack Developer who is creative, passionate about their work and looking to be assimilated into our amazing team.

We are an award winning creative tech agency with the ambition of becoming the best. We have offices in Vancouver and London specializing in mobile, web, and interactive installations. Our clients include Sundance Film Festival, HPE, Cisco, Kraft, SXSW, and... you get the idea. We're a fun, fast-moving, small company where you'll definitely see the work you do put into action.

As a Full Stack Developer at Intergalactic you'll mainly be writing Javascript. Our current stack is generally Node | GraphQL | MongoDB | React/Redux though you’ll definitely have the opportunity to try new tech as it comes out. We’re also interested in devs able to work in Drupal | PHP | PostgreSQL. Check out more details about this position here: https://secure.collage.co/jobs/intergalacticagency/4708.

Get in touch with us at jobs@intergalactic.com.
